title: Professor Sexy
description: There's something sexy about being hot for teacher....  Tyler Saxton is an injured hockey player looking to pass the time before he can get back in the game he lives for.  Neiko Brown is in her last semester of studying to be an Athletic Trainer and has just gotten over the flu.   Now, she just wishes her friends would stop talking about Professor Sexy in their group chat.  When she finally makes it to class and takes one look at the hot, muscled athlete...well, all those late night notifications finally make sense.  A playboy who's never wanted a relationship. A woman that's only had commitment.  Are there lessons that they can learn from each other, or are they doomed to have a love connection that just  won't make the grade?  Professor Sexy is a 25,000 word novella with a HEA and enough steam to set your kindle aflame.
author: Aja Cole
